summary: Implemented new bottom navigation component and added routes/pages for Languages, Profile, Notifications, and Averages. AppShell now conditionally renders the bottom nav for authenticated users and adds bottom padding to prevent overlap. One notable deviation: the bottom nav is hidden on medium+ viewports (mobile-only).

missing_requirements.requirement: Bottom navigation bar is visible on all app pages for authenticated users.
missing_requirements.reason: The new bottom navigation is explicitly hidden on medium and larger screens via `md:hidden`, so it is not visible on all pages across all viewport sizes for authenticated users.

hallucinated_features.description: Bottom navigation is implemented as mobile-only (hidden on md+ viewports).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not specify limiting the bottom navigation to mobile; it asked for a persistent bottom navigation for authenticated users.

hallucinated_features.description: Averages page computes and displays aggregate metrics from goals (average progress, completion rate) with loading/error/empty states.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 only requested a page route and UI scaffold/title for Averages (explicitly non-goal to implement additional behavior beyond scaffold for Languages; Averages behavior was not requested).
